value:
Roy and I are good friends, but...
Marriage? I-I'm not sure about that...

I've heard that Lord Eliwood looked
exactly like Roy when he was young.
I wonder what his wife looked like...

My father got so worked up... "It's
too soon for you to marry!" "At least
stay in Ostia with me when you do!"$k$pReally, Father, it's only a festival...

I would like to have a real wedding
ceremony of my own one day. Don't
worry—I'll be sure to invite you too!

Scrambling to get the bridal bouquet
sounds a little scary, but I've made up
my mind. That bouquet will be mine!

My dream came true! I hope you,
too, are blessed by this happiness
one day!

All of the well wishes I've received
are making my magic stronger! I hope
everyone can experience this one day.

With the power of love! ...Th-this is a
little embarrassing...

I've looked forward to wearing this
dress for too long to have something
like this ruin it!

I'll need to study a lot if I'm to
become a proper lady. So thanks!

On my name as Lilina of Ostia, I vow
to play the role of bride better than
anyone else at this festival!

I wonder how Roy feels about me...
It's so hard to tell what he's thinking
sometimes.$k$pOh, $Nu!$k$pNo, no, I'm not crying. I'm just... Well,
I guess I'm thinking about the future.$k$pNot only are Roy and I the same age,
but our fathers are also close friends.$k$pNeedless to say, the two of us have
been friends for a long, long time.$k$pSo when Roy said we should both do
our best in the festival, I was really
happy...$k$pBut then I realized he was cheering
on other girls, as well. And I'm just...
I'm not sure what to think.$k$p...Mhm. Right, yes... I was the first to
love Roy, it's true. And I always will.$k$pSo I can't let this get me down.
I won't lose to those other girls!
Thank you, $Nu!
Hah!
Take this
Kyah!
At this rate...
I pledge my love!
We'll be together!
Together forever!
How wonderful...
My love's not enough?
(Chuckle)
I'm Lilina. This is the first time I've worn a dress like this… How does it look? Good, I hope!
Ah! Hey! Can't you see how nervous I am?!
I always thought I'd wear something like this, one day... But after actually putting it on, I'm not quite sure how to feel.
Even if this is only a festival, I'm not sure Father's happy about the reminder that I'll get married one day... Hee-hee-hee.
Oh, I wish I could have seen Father and Mother's wedding.
Roy... Someday, you and I…
One day, I'll have my very own, proper ceremony. You'll be there for that as well, right?
Understood.
Together…
It's like a dream.
